title: T206 PSA 4 Drum (Warhop) - Looking for a new home

posts.post_title: T206 PSA 4 Drum (Warhop) - Looking for a new home
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott levy
Time to sell off one of my gems....T206 Drum PSA 4 - Warhop

It's a tad stained, but otherwise everything you'd expect from a PSA 4 DRUM (no qualifiers). Open to offers, but likely to accept the first cash offer at around $5k. And if it doesn't sell, I think I can live with having the card a little longer 

scottglevy@yahoo.com
